00017 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <math.h>
00020 #include <string.h>
00021 
00022 /*  LEAP_GREGORIAN  --  Is a given year in the Gregorian calendar a leap year ? */
00023 
00024 static int leap_gregorian(int year)
00025 {
00026     return ((year % 4) == 0) &&
00027             (!(((year % 100) == 0) && ((year % 400) != 0)));
00028 }
00029 
00030 /*  GREGORIAN_TO_JD  --  Determine Julian day number from Gregorian calendar date */
00031 
00032 #define GREGORIAN_EPOCH 1721425.5
00033 
00034 static double gregorian_to_jd(int year, int month, int day)
00035 {
00036     return (GREGORIAN_EPOCH - 1.0) +
00037            (365.0 * (year - 1.0)) +
00038            floor((year - 1.0) / 4.0) +
00039            (-floor((year - 1.0) / 100.0)) +
00040            floor((year - 1.0) / 400.0) +
00041            floor((((367.0 * month) - 362.0) / 12.0) +
00042            ((month <= 2) ? 0 :
00043                                (leap_gregorian(year) ? -1 : -2)
00044            ) +
00045            day);
00046 }
00047 
00048 /*  MOD  --  Modulus function which works for non-integers.  */
00049 
00050 static double mod(double a, double b)
00051 {
00052     return a - (b * floor(a / b));
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 /*  JD_TO_GREGORIAN  --  Calculate Gregorian calendar date from Julian day */
00057 
00058 static void jd_to_gregorian(double jd, int *y, int *m, int *d)
00059 {
00060   double wjd;
00061   double depoch;
00062   double quadricent;
00063   double dqc;
00064   int cent;
00065   double dcent;
00066   double quad;
00067   double dquad;
00068   int yindex;
00069   int year;
00070   int month;
00071   int day;
00072   double yearday;
00073   int leapadj;
00074 
00075   wjd = floor(jd - 0.5) + 0.5;
00076   depoch = wjd - GREGORIAN_EPOCH;
00077   quadricent = floor(depoch / 146097);
00078   dqc = mod(depoch, 146097);
00079   cent = (int)floor(dqc / 36524);
00080   dcent = mod(dqc, 36524);
00081   quad = floor(dcent / 1461);
00082   dquad = mod(dcent, 1461);
00083   yindex = (int)floor(dquad / 365);
00084   year = (int)((quadricent * 400) + (cent * 100) + (quad * 4) + yindex);
00085   if (!((cent == 4) || (yindex == 4))) {
00086     year++;
00087   }
00088   yearday = wjd - gregorian_to_jd(year, 1, 1);
00089   leapadj = ((wjd < gregorian_to_jd(year, 3, 1)) ? 0 :
00090          (leap_gregorian(year) ? 1 : 2));
00091   month = (int)floor((((yearday + leapadj) * 12) + 373) / 367);
00092   day = (int)((wjd - gregorian_to_jd(year, month, 1)) + 1);
00093 
00094   *y = year;
00095   *m = month;
00096   *d = day;
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*  JHMS  --  Convert Julian time to hour, minutes, and seconds. */
00100 
00101 static void jhms(double j, int *hour, int *min, int *sec)
00102 {
00103     int ij;
00104 
00105     j += 0.5;                 /* Astronomical to civil */
00106     ij = (int)(((j - floor(j)) * 86400.0) + 0.5);
00107     *hour = (int)floor(ij / 3600);
00108     *min = (int)floor((ij / 60) % 60);
00109     *sec = (int)floor(ij % 60);
00110 }
00111 
00126 MTKt_status MtkJulianToCal(
00127   double jd, 
00128   int *year, 
00129   int *month, 
00130   int *day, 
00131   int *hour, 
00132   int *min, 
00133   int *sec  )
00134 {
00135   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return code of this function */
00136 
00137   if (year == NULL || month == NULL || day == NULL ||
00138       hour == NULL || min == NULL || sec == NULL)
00139     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00140 
00141   if (jd < 1721119.5)
00142     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00143 
00144   jd_to_gregorian(jd,year,month,day);
00145   jhms(jd,hour,min,sec);
00146 
00147   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00148 
00149 ERROR_HANDLE:
00150   return status_code;
00151 }
